result.execSummary:
Julius L Hart was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Julius L Hart was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Julius L Hart

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Julius L Hart not in court.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant has been turned over to the State of Indiana.
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Julius L Hart in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Julius L Hart in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Status Conference held.  Defense requests Defendant be released with cash bail and return to Indiana on his own as the authories have not picked him up yet.  Arguments heard.  Court denies motion and advises bail should be addressed by the commissioner on the next date if Defendant is still in custody.  Status conference scheduled for March 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Julius L Hart in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Defendant Julius L Hart in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Indiana.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
